questions.text: Which Azure service provides fully managed PostgreSQL as a platform as a service?
questions.explanation: Azure Database for PostgreSQL es la versión PaaS totalmente administrada que elimina la necesidad de gestionar la infraestructura subyacente.

questions.text: What are two benefits of platform as a service (PaaS) relational database offerings in Azure? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
options: Complete control over backup and restore processes
Reduced administrative effort for managing the server infrastructure
questions.explanation: Los servicios PaaS ofrecen actualizaciones automáticas con las últimas características y reducen significativamente la carga administrativa al gestionar automáticamente la infraestructura del servidor.

questions.text: For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.

statements.text: Relational database tables contain columns and rows.
Indexes in a relational database describe the data types in a table.
A database view is a virtual table whose content is defined by a query.

questions.explanation: Las tablas relacionales almacenan datos en filas y columnas. Los índices aceleran las búsquedas pero no describen tipos de datos (eso lo hace el esquema). Las vistas son tablas virtuales basadas en consultas SELECT.

questions.text: Which type of database contains nodes and edges?
questions.explanation: Las bases de datos de grafos almacenan datos como nodos (entidades) y aristas (relaciones entre entidades), ideales para representar redes sociales, sistemas de recomendación y análisis de relaciones complejas.

questions.text: For each of the following statements about Azure Synapse Analytics, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.

statements.text: Azure Synapse Analytics is designed for Online Transaction Processing (OLTP) workloads.
Azure Synapse Analytics can integrate with Power BI for data visualization.
Azure Synapse Analytics supports both serverless and dedicated SQL pools.
Azure Synapse Analytics cannot process unstructured data.

questions.explanation: Azure Synapse Analytics está diseñado para OLAP (no OLTP), se integra perfectamente con Power BI, ofrece pools SQL serverless y dedicados, y puede procesar datos estructurados y no estructurados mediante Apache Spark.
